subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Souvenirs
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: One of sport’s oddest souvenirs, the oversize tennis ball, is 11 inches in diameter and priced proportionately. It is also a huge seller at the United States Open.
